textos_fuente.text: About Us – River of Life Worship Center Skip to content WELCOME.. About Us* Founders Page Our Beliefs Our Worship Contact Us New Member Application Give** Ministries.. **Gallery** Outreach Evangelism-training ^^New Blog*** Events Learn more about who we are, what we stand for, and how our love for the Lord is changing the world. Our Mission “Go into all the world and preach the good news to everyone.” ~ Mark 16:15 Our Vision To see our region transformed by the power and love of Jesus Christ . Missions ROLWC is committed to fulfilling the “ Great Commission ” mandated by Jesus Christ.  Currently, this ministry prayerfully and financially supports ministries in India, Central America, South America, the South Pacific, Africa, Albania, and other national and local ministries. Our Beliefs We stand on scripture in all that we do. To learn more about our beliefs, click the button below. Our Beliefs Integrity Financial Integrity: ROLWC’s financial/accounting transactions are reconciled monthly by the professional accounting and consultant corporation of Chitwood & Chitwood , based in Chattanooga, Tennessee.  Chitwood & Chitwood operates with “a heart for the ministry and a mind for the Lord’s business.” ROLWC records, business documents and financial transactions and activities have been examined and tested by Chitwood & Chitwood under strict compliance audit standards.  The corporation has certified that ROWLC is operating in compliance with legal accounting practices and the Internal Revenue Service requirements.  It has also declared ROLWC to have the highest standards of credibility, integrity and financial accountability. Business Integrity: ROLWC is a charter member of the International Congress of Churches and Ministries (ICCM) , which provides 501 (C)(3) exemptions charters to ministries with the highest standards of accountability and responsibility. Our Worship Our worship is the lifeblood of our church! Click the button below to learn more about our worship. Our Worship Want to know more about us? We have several ministries that all share our core values. Learn More WELCOME.. The River Center – Where Our Community Comes Together Home Events Gallery Calendar Entertainment Entrepreneurship Voice of Palatka EcoTourism Contact Home Events Gallery Calendar Entertainment Entrepreneurship Voice of Palatka EcoTourism Contact Where Our Community Comes Together RESERVE US FOR YOUR NEXT EVENT! Where is TheRiverCenter? The River Center is a welcome center and gateway to the community. Nestled on the banks of the St. John's River, it serves as a venue for downtown events, a hub for local entertainment, a resource for local businesses and artists, and much more — driving the community and visitors into downtown and beyond. What's Inside Palatka Coffee Co. Local Business Displays Community Information Future of The River Center The River Center serve as a space and venue for downtown events, the gateway for commercial boat charter tours, local artist displays and much more -- driving the community and visitors into downtown and beyond. Why Book With Us For Your Next Event The River Center provides a variety of options. Whether its on the rooftop, balcony, greenspace, or indoors, there's a space specific for your needs. With the backdrop of the St. Johns River and the night stars shining above, memories will be made by locals and tourists to last a lifetime. Elevate your event with breathtaking views of Downtown Palatka & the St. Johns River Unforgettable moments await on our stunning rooftop terrace. Enjoy panoramic city views, fresh air, and a unique ambiance for your next event. Why Book With Us For Your Next Event The River Center provides a variety of options. How do I contact River? | River Help Center Skip to main content 0% How do I contact River? River Help Center Managing my account Support How do I contact River? River Help Center Managing my account Support River Home River Learn Contact us How do I contact River? Our Help Center contains answers to the most frequently asked questions. If you’re not able to find the answer to your question in our Help Center, you can email or call Client Services. You can email Client Services anytime at support@river.com . If you wish to instead speak with a live representative, you may also call us at (888) 801-2586 during business hours: Monday through Thursday 9:00 AM - 7 :00 PM EST Friday 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM EST Please note that any legal correspondence should be sent to legal@river.com . Any subpoena or law enforcement request should be sent to subpoenas@river.com . Contact a member of our team

Our People – River Capital About Us Our People Our Purpose & Values Environmental, Social and Governance Our Partners Products Venture Capital Mezzanine Funding Private Equity Investment Debt Funds Portfolio News Complaints Privacy Policy Cookies River Capital About Us Products Funds Portfolio News Let’s talk Let's Talk Our People Our Purpose & Values Environmental, Social and Governance Our Partners Fuelling Ambition Our People Our people Our people are unique and the strength of our team is crucial to our success. Come meet us: Dr Marc d’Abbadie Head of Venture & COO Mark Borzomato CEO and Head of Private Equity Chris Carter Investment Manager Sue Chambers Investment Manager Jeff Cummins Investment Manager Ethan Dent Marketing Manager Dave Furlong Investment Director John Gray Head of Debt Steve Hitchen Debt Portfolio Manager Ben Gregory Investment Manager Chris Hood Retail Operations Director Andy Jones Investment Manager Jim Moore Investment Manager Sarah Moss Head of Finance Rae Reardon Executive Assistant Marion Savill Portfolio Director Emma Rogers Business Support Manager Martin Sutton Venture Partner Jonathan Nelson Investment Manager Hannah Taylor HR Manager David Walters Investment Director Dr Marc d’Abbadie Head of Venture & COO marc.dabbadie@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? I am proud to look after River’s Equity practice as well our Operations and Compliance. Hobbies or interests outside of work? Tango Cooking Swimming. Favourite album? Appetite for Destruction by Guns n’ Roses. Mark Borzomato CEO and Head of Private Equity mark.borzomato@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? I am CEO of River and have been involved in private equity and investing for over twenty years. I am passionate about working with and supporting entrepreneurs/management of teams/SME’s to successfully deliver their aspirations. I am responsible for the strategic direction and vision of the business and maintaining our key stakeholder relationships, including with our investors. I am proud to lead a team at River who share this vision. Hobbies or interests outside of work? I manage a local football team I am a sporadic golfer A regular quiz go-er And full-time sufferer in the pain of being a Middlesbrough FC supporter! Favourite album? Rattle ‘n’ Hum by U2. Chris Carter Investment Manager chris.carter@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? I am an Investment Manager working on the NW BGL fund and responsible for the deployment of the fund across the North West, based from our Manchester office. We work to support the SME market at various stages of their growth cycle with funding requirements between £100k-£500k. Hobbies or interests outside of work? I am a massive sports and music enthusiast. I watch most sports on offer and, time permitting, am a keen runner, golfer, gym-frequenter, and with my footballing days very much heading towards their end, replacing this with playing darts! Favourite Album? Possibly the most difficult question I’ve ever been asked, and it depends on several factors such as what day of the week it is, what I had for dinner the night before, what direction the wind is blowing…. but I have chosen: Funeral For A Friend, Casually Dressed And Deep In Conversation Sue Chambers Investment Manager sue.chambers@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? I am an Investment Manager supporting small and medium businesses with debt finance up to £250,000 across the North West. In my role, I am also proud to be River’s Diversity and Inclusion Champion. Hobbies or interests outside of work? Theatre Concerts Pilates. Favourite album? Different Class by Pulp. Jeff Cummins Investment Manager jeff.cummins@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? I am an Investment Manager in our Debt team, who works with business owners and advisors to identify funding needs for a business and then deliver the most suitable solutions for that business. I am currently managing all enquiries and applications for the Flexible Growth Fund which is a debt fund aimed at supporting LCR businesses with transformational Capital Expenditure projects. Hobbies or interests outside of work? Playing Golf Watching Football Cycling, to keep fit & to watch. Favourite album? The soundtrack to Saturday Night Fever. Ethan Dent Marketing Manager ethan.dent@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? As Marketing Manager, I’m responsible for the day-to-day planning and execution of all marketing activities and support the business in communicating the types of funds we have available to investors. Hobbies or interests outside of work? Tragically supporting Everton Cricket Walking/Hiking. What is your all-time favourite album? Six60 by Six60. Dave Furlong Investment Director dave.furlong@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is your role: I’m responsible for our private equity fund, investing in high quality businesses across the North West looking for help with accelerating their growth, change of ownership (management buy-out etc), succession planning, partial de-risking of owners stakes in businesses and acquisition strategies. Hobbies outside of work. I’m a keen (but very lapsed!) guitarist who’s moved into the ‘all the gear and no idea’ phase of life. I’m also a Liverpool FC season ticket holder, and lover of rugby, cricket and ice hockey. I’m also a listening volunteer for Samaritans. I also love walking our Labrador with my wife and two daughters. When I can keep up with them…. Favourite Album: Tough choice in a crowded field, but In Rainbows by Radiohead. John Gray Head of Debt john.gray@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? As Head of Debt, I work with the team of Investment managers and oversee a portfolio of over £40m of debt funds, including the Northern Powerhouse Investment Fund , Flexible Growth Fund , and Business Growth Loan Fund . I’m driven by the company’s long-term goals and ambitions and was particularly drawn to River Capital’s commitment to growing funds under management, which will enable us to provide more efficient and effective support to SMEs not only in the Liverpool City Region but beyond. Hobbies? Golf Running Getting out into nature Fave album? Meatloaf – Bat Out of Hell Steve Hitchen Debt Portfolio Manager steve.hitchen@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? I provide post-investment support to our Debt Portfolio clients as their dedicated point of contact. Alongside this I manage the “collections” side of the debt book. Hobbies or interests outside of work? Sporting.Keep fit/gym/rugby training Watching Saints RLFC Dining out. Favourite album? That’s the Way of the World by Earth, Wind & Fire. Ben Gregory Investment Manager benjamin.gregory@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? I am an Investment Manager investing from our flagship Private Equity fund across the North of England. The best part about my job is meeting and learning from ambitious Management teams who have genuine passion for their craft. In my opinion, there are lots of exciting businesses in the market who have aspirations of going on a growth journey but often do not meet the financial criteria set by typical PE funds, which is the gap we are looking to bridge. Hobbies or interests outside of work? Outside of work you will usually find me in the gym, playing golf or complaining about Everton. What is your all-time favourite album? Same Town by the Killers. Chris Hood Retail Operations Director chris.hood@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? As Retail Operations Director I work closely with Financial Advisers/Intermediaries to enable clients to invest in appropriate Tax Wrappers such as the River Capital AI Enterprise Investment Scheme. Hobbies or interests outside of work? Supporting Liverpool Football Club Keeping Fit by playing various sports Travelling Fave album? Back In Black AC/DC Andy Jones Investment Manager andy.jones@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? As part of the Debt Team, I look at funding propositions for businesses of all ages, shapes and sizes who are looking to grow, expand, consolidate or even get off the ground. My part of our business is to look at supporting entrepreneurs and companies looking for between £5,000 and £250,000. I lead on our Small Business Loan Fund which has enabled me to spend time with other small business lenders who are also part of the Responsible Finance network nationally. In addition, as our ESG Champion, I am looking at how our business can reduce its carbon footprint by working on a Net Zero project with the aim of reviewing working practices, energy usage etc to ensure we are playing our part in this critical area. Hobbies or interests outside of work? Socialising with friends and family Tranmere Rovers – following them attending games Tennis – playing and also an active member of the Committee at Pinewood LTC in Heswall. Favourite album? Melting Pot by The Charlatans. Jim Moore Investment Manager jim.moore@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? I focus on purely Loan & Mezzanine Debt Funds assessing and recommending loans typically from £100k up to £1m across the North-West. Hobbies or interests outside of work? All things Glasgow Celtic All things golfing Holidays involving sunshine. Favourite album? Anything by the ‘Boss’. Sarah Moss Head of Finance sarah.moss@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? I oversee the finance function of the business, including producing monthly management reports, analysis of the business performance and how to drive this forward. In addition, I create annual budgets, cash forecasting and regulatory reporting. Hobbies or interests outside of work? Running & triathlon training Walking my dog Kip Reading, a good crime novel or self development book. Favourite album? It’ll All Make Sense In The End by James Arthur. Rae Reardon Executive Assistant rae.reardon@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? I provide executive support to the CEO and general support to the wider team. My role includes managing the CEO’s diary, scheduling meetings, coordinating strategy days and events, and ensuring the smooth day-to-day running of the office. I arrange and take minutes for meetings across the Debt, Equity, and Venture investment committees, as well as for Portfolio Reviews. I also support the River Capital and MSIF boards by managing meeting schedules, preparing agendas, and taking minutes. Hobbies or interests outside of work? I am passionate about caring for dogs and love boarding them in my home! It is truly rewarding to provide a safe and happy space for them while their families are away on holiday. I also enjoy spending time outdoors, especially taking long walks on the beach or through local parks with them. Family plays a central role in my life, and I deeply value the time we spend together. Favourite Album Def Leopard – Hysteria Marion Savill Portfolio Director marion.savill@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? I manage a portfolio of equity investments mostly in the Merseyside Loan and Equity Fund. In addition to this, I work with the boards of our investee companies to help them achieve their strategic goals and ultimately to maximise the value of our investment via a sale or flotation. Hobbies or interests outside of work? I enjoy outdoor sports and activities I play hockey for Chester Ladies I am a regular runner and enjoy hill walking I also love travelling and skiing. Favourite album? 21 by Adele. Emma Rogers Business Support Manager emma.rogers@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? I have various jobs within the Company. I support our Debt Investment Team including drawing up offer letters, checking drawdowns, completing KYC/AML checks, making sure required reporting is done on time and dealing with audits of the funds. I also assist our Equity Team with collections and share reconciliations. Alongside the funds, I also help the Financial Controller with monthly/annual accounts. Hobbies or interests outside of work? I am part of my local judo club where I am also the Club Welfare Officer Spending time with friends – especially our trips to Kraków Swimming. Favourite album? Slippery When Wet by Bon Jovi. Martin Sutton Venture Partner martin.sutton@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 My Role: To find great businesses that could be a fit for FundAI and help the founders navigate the investment process.  Having spent all my career working in fast growth / venture backed tech firms I’m passionate about making the investment process more straightforward for founding teams. Hobbies: Being outdoors either running or walking in the lakes with Lenny our Airedale Terrier followed by a pint of Guinness in a proper pub with a few mates. I’m also a bit of an anorak for older air-cooled Porsches. Favourite album: Plastic Beach by Gorillaz Jonathan Nelson Investment Manager jonathan.nelson@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 About my role: I assist businesses in Lancashire and Cumbria with access to NPIF II funding and look to provide loans between £25,000 & £100,000k. Hobbies: I help manage a senior and Under 23s team at Croston Football Club, watch both my lads play football, regular taxi service for them as well, eating out with my wife Nicola which always includes coffee or a beer and occasionally a walk! Poor golfer, tennis player and exerciser but will give anything a go! Album: Parallel Lines by Blondie Hannah Taylor HR Manager 0151 236 4040 What is my role? As our HR Manager, I am responsible for managing River’s employee life cycle (recruitment, onboarding, training and leavers) as well as the administration of employee benefits. Working alongside the management team, it is my mission to ensure that River’s employees are adequately managed, appropriately compensated and effectively trained. Hobbies or interests outside of work? Book worm Going to gigs Following Manchester United across the U.K. and abroad. What is your all-time favourite album? St. Jude by The Courteeners. David Walters Investment Director david.walters@rivercapitaluk.com 0151 236 4040 What is my role? I work in the Equity Team as a Technology Investment Director and support technology businesses across the region. I have also operated as a CTO at multiple PE backed companies and have also run AI practices. Data and Artificial Intelligence is my superpower and I am a member of the DataIQ 100. Hobbies or interests outside of work? I collect and restore classic Italian scooters I play the guitar I support the mighty Tranmere Rovers. Favourite album? Sound Affects by The Jam.
